price: 202. Kuwaasi waxay leeyihiin qayb(tooda) ka mid ah waxay kasbadeen. Allena wuu ku Dhakhso Badan yahay xisaabta.
arabic: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ لَهُمۡ نَصِيبٞ مِّمَّا كَسَبُواْۚ وَٱللَّهُ سَرِيعُ ٱلۡحِسَابِ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: ulāika lahum naṣībun mimmā kasabū wal-lahu sarīʿu al-ḥisābi
